ARGUMENT
r s

|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | isrhm.m | |- M = ( mulGrp ` R ) |
| 2 |  | isrhm.n | |- N = ( mulGrp ` S ) |
| 3 |  | #P_dfrhm2 | |- RingHom = ( r e. Ring , s e. Ring |-> ( ( r GrpHom s ) i^i ( ( mulGrp ` r ) MndHom ( mulGrp ` s ) ) ) ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_elmpt2cl | |- ( F e. ( R RingHom S ) -> ( R e. Ring /\ S e. Ring ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_oveq12 | |- ( ( r = R /\ s = S ) -> ( r GrpHom s ) = ( R GrpHom S ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( r = R -> ( mulGrp ` r ) = ( mulGrp ` R ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( s = S -> ( mulGrp ` s ) = ( mulGrp ` S ) ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_oveqan12d | |- ( ( r = R /\ s = S ) -> ( ( mulGrp ` r ) MndHom ( mulGrp ` s ) ) = ( ( mulGrp ` R ) MndHom ( mulGrp ` S ) ) ) |
| 9 | 5, 8 | #P_ineq12d | |- ( ( r = R /\ s = S ) -> ( ( r GrpHom s ) i^i ( ( mulGrp ` r ) MndHom ( mulGrp ` s ) ) ) = ( ( R GrpHom S ) i^i ( ( mulGrp ` R ) MndHom ( mulGrp ` S ) ) ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_ovex | |- ( R GrpHom S ) e. _V |

| 14 |  | #P_elin | |- ( F e. ( ( R GrpHom S ) i^i ( ( mulGrp ` R ) MndHom ( mulGrp ` S ) ) ) <-> ( F e. ( R GrpHom S ) /\ F e. ( ( mulGrp ` R ) MndHom ( mulGrp ` S ) ) ) ) |

| 16 | 15 | #P_eqcomi | |- ( ( mulGrp ` R ) MndHom ( mulGrp ` S ) ) = ( M MndHom N ) |
| 17 | 16 | #P_eleq2i | |- ( F e. ( ( mulGrp ` R ) MndHom ( mulGrp ` S ) ) <-> F e. ( M MndHom N ) ) |
| 18 | 17 | #P_anbi2i | |- ( ( F e. ( R GrpHom S ) /\ F e. ( ( mulGrp ` R ) MndHom ( mulGrp ` S ) ) ) <-> ( F e. ( R GrpHom S ) /\ F e. ( M MndHom N ) ) ) |
| 19 | 14, 18 | #P_bitri | |- ( F e. ( ( R GrpHom S ) i^i ( ( mulGrp ` R ) MndHom ( mulGrp ` S ) ) ) <-> ( F e. ( R GrpHom S ) /\ F e. ( M MndHom N ) ) ) |
| 20 | 13, 19 | #P_syl6bb | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ S e. Ring ) -> ( F e. ( R RingHom S ) <-> ( F e. ( R GrpHom S ) /\ F e. ( M MndHom N ) ) ) ) |
